00020 #ifndef H_READ
00021 #define H_READ
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <iostream>
00025 #include "utils.h"

00028 namespace RDK2 { namespace Serialization {
00029     
00030     using namespace std;
00031     class Reader;
00032 
00036     class Readable {
00037         public:
00047         virtual void read(Reader*r)  throw (ReadingException) = 0;
00048         virtual ~Readable() {};
00049     };
00050     
00051     class Reader {
00052         public:
00053             virtual Readable * deserialize(cstr) = 0;
00054             virtual void deserialize(cstr, Readable *) = 0;
00055             virtual ~Reader() {};
00056             
00057         public:
00060         virtual unsigned char startReading(cstr className) throw(ReadingException) = 0;
00061             
00062             virtual   uint8_t read_u8 (cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) = 0;
00063             virtual    int8_t read_i8 (cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) = 0;
00064             virtual   int16_t read_i16(cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) = 0;
00065             virtual   int32_t read_i32(cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) = 0;
00066             virtual float32_t read_f32(cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) = 0;
00067             virtual float64_t read_f64(cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) = 0;
00068             
00069             virtual void read_u8   (  uint8_t**, size_t* n, cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) =0;
00070             virtual void read_i8   (   int8_t**, size_t* n, cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) =0;
00071             virtual void read_i16  (  int16_t**, size_t* n, cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) =0;
00072             virtual void read_i32  (  int32_t**, size_t* n, cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) =0;
00073             virtual void read_f32  (float32_t**, size_t* n, cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) =0;
00074             virtual void read_f64  (float64_t**, size_t* n, cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) =0;
00075 
00076             virtual void readBytes (     void**, size_t* n, cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) =0;
00077 
00079             virtual std::string readString(cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) =0;
00080             
00082             virtual void readObject(Readable*r, cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) = 0;
00083 
00086             virtual Readable* readObject(cstr name="") throw(ReadingException) = 0;
00087         
00088         virtual void doneReading() throw(ReadingException) =0 ;
00089     
00090         virtual void error(cstr message) throw(ReadingException)=0;
00091     };
00092     
00093 }} // namespace RDK2::Serialization
00094 
00095 namespace RDK2 {
00096     using Serialization::Reader;
00097     using Serialization::ReadingException;  
00098 }
